Support
========

nDeploy is licensed under GPLv3 .
Users can install and use the product for free .
There is no need to purchase any recurring license to install or use nDeploy
There is no seperate version of nDeploy provided with a different feature set

The people behind nDeploy provides their expertise in installing and setting up of the software
commercially .This is like you getting an Jumbo Jet for free but hiring a pilot to fly it

Commercial Support for nDeploy,nDeploy-cluster,DuET cPanel etc can be availed by purchasing a SysAdmin plan
at   https://sysally.net/plans/

**Community Support**

This is like you getting advise from fellow pilots and flying the airplane on your own

DISCUSS https://support.sysally.net/projects/ndeploy/boards
REPORT BUGS https://github.com/AnoopAlias/nDeploy/issues
CONTRIBUTE https://github.com/AnoopAlias/nDeploy
